Start Here¶

Read this first to get oriented before installing and running the project.

Who this is for¶

  • New contributors who want a high-level overview

  • Reviewers and operators who need to understand capabilities quickly

What you will do¶

  • Review prerequisites and environment variables

  • Prepare your local environment

  • Follow the step-by-step setup guide

Prerequisites¶

See Orange County Lettings - Getting Started for tooling and installation steps (Git, Python, SQLite).
